comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Dr. Jean Laurent (or Johann Lorenz) Blessig (1747-1816) was a professor of theology and philosophy at the University of Strasbourg, among other positions. He was imprisoned during the French Revolution in 1793. www.ccel.org/ccel/schaff/encyc02.html?term=Blessig, Johann Lorenz
